paragraph.paragraph: It is possible to type a class or feature name to center the editor on it. Typing a class name that does not exist in the set of known classes pops up a dialog to create a class of that name.
paragraph.tip: Tip: Wildcards (* and ?) are available in these fields.
Tip: The history is also accessible in the View/Go to menu.
